sys_ux_client_script.name: mapReservationsToEvents

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_1111aeed932cb65005087efdfaba1041
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">c2f9f1a09368725005087efdfaba1080</macroponent><name>mapReservationsToEvents</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
  // 1) Data Resource (ID ggf. anpassen)
  var dr = api.data.record_list_data_fetch_1 || api.data.record_list_data_fetch || {};
  var rows = dr.result || dr.data || [];

  // 2) Datum → ISO (falls nötig; wenn schon ISO kommt, wird es einfach zurückgegeben)
  function toISO(v) {
    if (!v) return null;
    var d = new Date(v);
    return isNaN(d.getTime()) ? v : d.toISOString();
  }

  // 3) Mapping: Records -> Calendar Events
  var events = rows.map(function (r) {
    var roomDisplay = r.room && (r.room.display_value || r.room.name || r.room);
    var title = roomDisplay || r.short_description || "Reservation";

    return {
      id: r.sys_id,
      title: title,
      start: toISO(r.planned_start),
      end: toISO(r.planned_end),
      extendedProps: {
        sys_id: r.sys_id,
        room: roomDisplay || ""
      }
    };
  }).filter(function (e) {
    return e.start && e.end;
  });

  // 4) Output fürs Data-Binding
  return { events: events };
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-12 18:37:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>1111aeed932cb65005087efdfaba1041</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>mapReservationsToEvents</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NowRoom" source="x_1782765_nowroom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NowRoom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1111aeed932cb65005087efdfaba1041</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-12 18:37:40</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
